titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Ethyl 3-amino-4,4,-trifluorocrotonate.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Ethyl 3-amino-4,4,-trifluorocrotonate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Ethyl 3-amino-4,4,-trifulorocrotonate.
